page.title: 11Family Life
page.content: On a Sunday morning I usually get up about 8.00. For breakfast I have a piece of toast. Then I feed the hens, and see if the Banty has laid any eggs, and feed the cats for Mum. When Dad gets up we go for a walk down by the river to check up on the ducklings. After we have had dinner me and my sister go out side to play tennis in the barn. Some times when Mum and Dad have washed up we go over to Grandma's to get some eggs. When we get home we have tea and watch telly for a while until the water is hot for Mum to wash up. When they are in the middle of washing up I usually make some short bread and spicey flapjacks for the next day. Then me and my sister have a bath and have some supper and go to bed.
